sn35.10:1.3: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītesu rūpesu anapekkho hoti;
sn35.10:1.5: paccuppannānaṃ rūpānaṃ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn35.10:1.12: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītesu dhammesu anapekkho hoti;
sn35.10:1.14: paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
